The claim made by Travis Forward: a pro-bonds PAC, that the Travis County propositions will not raise taxes and that property taxes are frozen for homeowners aged 65 or older.
The quick response from Travis County of: 3. The explanation provided by Travis County Judge Sarah Eckhardt that consultants behind the mailer may have misunderstood the difference between a homestead tax exemption and a tax freeze.
The acknowledgment from Travis Forward: s campaign manager, Mykle Tomlinson, that errors occurred in the mailers targeting older residents and the subsequent plan to send postcards to clarify the misinformation.
